about_the_game:
The Adventure Begins

Take control of the unlikely duo of a cat and a capybara as you embark on a heartwarming journey. Battle through the evil bird army and save all the dogs scattered throughout diverse and vibrant worlds. With each rescue, you'll get closer to thwarting the bird army's sinister plans and restoring peace.

Reach New Heights with Unique Mount Mechanics

In Cat & Capy, teamwork is key. Utilize the unique mount mechanic where Cat and Capy can stack on top of each other to overcome obstacles, reach new heights, and unlock hidden paths.

Work Together in Local Co-op

Prepare for lots of laughter, strategic thinking, and maybe a bit of frustration with your playing partner as you work together to complete the game. Experience the fun and challenge of coordinating your actions in local split-screen multiplayer.

Unlock Different Animals and Customize Your Character

As you progress through the game, you will unlock new characters and cosmetics. Discover and play as different animals, including special guest characters from various content creators. Customize your characters to make your adventure even more unique and enjoyable.

short_description: Cat & Capy is a heartwarming 3D platformer where you play as the cat and capybara from the viral Matato Games video series on TikTok and Instagram. Embark on an adventurous journey to rescue dogs, explore diverse worlds, and battle the nefarious bird army!
